headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Heists Now Available
content:
Heists are now available in GTA Online, offering a host of new vehicles, clothing, weapons and tactical gear as well as high-octane, adrenaline fuelled missions that will push you and your friends to the limits.

Once you have reached Rank 12 or higher, and own a high-end Apartment, Lester will give you a call and arrange to meet you to introduce you to the Heists â€“ head to his warehouse (marked with an L on the map).
